channel.title: Thoughts on A Thoughtful Goose
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on A Thoughtful Goose

item.title: The Purpose of Life
item.description: So lets start by being clear with what I mean by “The Purpose of Life”. What I’m referring to is the chemical process we call Life, the one that would be observable by some outside being if they were to come across Earth. That’s Life with the capital ‘L’, and it includes your life and every other life on the planet, but it isn’t about making any value judgments on what you are doing with your personal life.
